activities: Ziff Davis, LLC and its wholly-owned US subsidiary IGN Entertainment, Inc. uses personal information that it receives from the EU and Switzerland primarily for marketing services and products to our customers.  Such marketing activities include displaying online ads, newsletters, conducting contests, competitions or sweepstakes and e-commerce activities.  Ziff Davis, LLC and its UK subsidiary IGN Entertainment UK Limited may collect personal information of individuals who work for IGN Entertainment UK Limited solely for business purposes, including those required by governmental agencies.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: User Data and Human Resources Data.  Such data includes manually processed data.
recoursemech: For Human Resource Data, we use the European Union Data Protection Authorities. For all other data, we use TRUSTe.
